original_text: These also King David dedicated to the Lord, together with the silver and gold that he dedicated from all the nations he subdued,
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 그것도 여호와께 드리되 그가 정복한 모든 나라에서 얻은 은금

sentences.original_text: These also King David dedicated to the Lord,
together with the silver and gold
that he dedicated from all the nations
